description: Staying informed is important, but it's equally important to consume news from reliable sources and maintain a healthy balance to avoid information overload.
sentences: Diversify your news sources to get a balanced perspective.
Differentiate between news reporting and opinion pieces.
Set a specific time for consuming news to avoid constant, anxiety-inducing updates.
Be aware of clickbait and sensationalized headlines.
dos: Read from multiple sources with different viewpoints.
Focus on in-depth articles rather than just headlines.
Take breaks from the news cycle to protect your mental health.
Support credible journalism by subscribing if you can.
donts: Don't rely on social media forwards for news.
Don't get into arguments in online comment sections.
Don't believe everything you read online.
